ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.36"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10689)/@code="69462-0" EMS prearrival activation performed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10688)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:10690)
NEMSIS Trace: EDisposition.24

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:10691)
NEMSIS Trace: EDisposition.25 Required if value is TRUE
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10689)/@code="69462-0" EMS prearrival activation performed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10688)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:10691)
NEMSIS Trace: EDisposition.25 Required if value is TRUE

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:10690)
NEMSIS Trace: EDisposition.24

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.36"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1869393002"/> <code code="69462-0" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="EMS prearrival activation performed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="BL"/> </observation>
